meanings.sent1: I caught a roach while fishing in the river.
meanings.sent2: The roach swam gracefully in the clear stream.
meanings.sent3: Why did the roach bring a fishing rod to the party? To catch up with old friends!
meanings.sent4: The roach darted through the water like a silver arrow.
meanings.sent5: The roach's scales shimmered in the sunlight, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The butt of a marijuana cigarette.
meanings.sent1: He flicked the roach from the end of the joint.
meanings.sent2: The roach smoldered in the ashtray, releasing a faint scent.
meanings.sent3: Why did the roach refuse to share the joint? It was feeling a bit burnt out!
meanings.sent4: The roach glowed like a tiny ember in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The roach's tip glowed red, signaling the end of the smoke.

meanings.sent1: I saw a roach scurry across the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent2: The roach disappeared into a crack in the wall.
meanings.sent3: Why did the roach attend cooking class? To learn how to make a quick escape!
meanings.sent4: The roach seemed to defy gravity as it climbed the wall.
meanings.sent5: The roach's antennae twitched nervously as it explored its surroundings.
